Title: An Act Converting the Banaran Barangay High School in the Municipality of Sapa-Sapa, Province of Tawi-Tawi, into a National High School to be Known as the Banaran National High School and Appropriating Funds Therefor
Data:
BATAS PAMBANSA Blg. 573
An Act Converting the Banaran Barangay High School in the Municipality of Sapa-Sapa, Province of Tawi-Tawi, into a National High School to be Known as the Banaran National High School and Appropriating Funds Therefor
Section 1. The Banaran Barangay High School in the Municipality of Sapa-Sapa, Province of Tawi-Tawi, is converted into a national high school to be known as the Banaran National High School.
Section 2. The operation of said school for the current fiscal year shall continue to be funded out of local funds and from its shares of national aid to local schools. The requirements for succeeding fiscal years shall be provided in the forthcoming General Appropriations Acts.
Section 3. This Act shall take effect upon its approval.
Approved: June 24, 1983
